statements: UPDATE pricing_strategies SET price = 15.99, competitor_name = 'Competitor A' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE pricing_strategies SET product_name = 'Product X', sale_date = '2021-08-15' WHERE competitor_name = 'Competitor B';
UPDATE pricing_strategies SET price = 50.00, competitor_name = 'ABC Corp' WHERE id = 101 AND product_name = 'Product A' AND sale_date = '2022-09-15';
UPDATE pricing_strategies SET competitor_name = 'XYZ Inc', price = 75.00 WHERE product_name = 'Product B' AND sale_date = '2022-09-20' AND id = 202;
UPDATE competitor_data SET price = 25.99 WHERE competitor_id = 1;
UPDATE sales_records SET revenue = 5000.75, units_sold = 100 WHERE sale_id = 10;
UPDATE competitor_data SET price = 19.99, date_updated = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE competitor_id = 123 AND product_id = 456;
UPDATE sales_records SET units_sold = units_sold + 10, revenue = revenue * 1.1 WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-01' AND product_id = 789;
UPDATE Competitors SET competitor_name = 'New Competitor Name', products_sold = '{"Product A": 100, "Product B": 200}' WHERE competitor_id = 1;
UPDATE SalesRecords SET total_sales = 5000.50, sales_date = '2022-05-15' WHERE record_id = 102;
UPDATE Competitors SET products_sold = '{"computers": 100, "phones": 200}' WHERE competitor_id = 1;
UPDATE SalesRecords SET total_sales = 15000.50, sales_date = '2022-05-20' WHERE record_id = 5;
UPDATE competitor_data SET competitor_name = 'New Competitor Name' WHERE competitor_id = 1;
UPDATE product_prices SET current_price = 25.99, previous_price = 22.50 WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE competitor_data SET competitor_name = 'New Competitor', product_category = 'Electronics' WHERE competitor_id = 1;
UPDATE product_prices SET current_price = 99.99, previous_price = 79.99 WHERE product_name = 'Smartphone';
UPDATE competitor_data SET price = 39.99 WHERE competitor_name = 'ABC Inc.';
UPDATE competitor_analysis SET strength = 'Quality products' WHERE competitor_name = 'XYZ Corp.';
UPDATE competitor_data SET price = 19.99, timestamp = NOW() WHERE competitor_name = 'ABC Inc' AND product_name = 'XYZ Product';
UPDATE historical_sales_records SET total_sales = total_sales * 1.1 WHERE product_id = 123 AND sale_date = '2022-01-31';
